meanings.definition: A blood vessel that carries blood away from the heart to the rest of the body.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that a clogged artery can cause serious health problems.
meanings.sent2: The artery pumped blood efficiently throughout the body.
meanings.sent3: I told a joke about an artery walking into a bar, but it was too vein.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness flowed through her like a clear artery, touching everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The image of the artery branching out like a river stuck in my mind.

meanings.sent1: The accident on the main artery caused a traffic jam.
meanings.sent2: The artery was busy with cars rushing to their destinations.
meanings.sent3: I saw a squirrel trying to cross the busy artery, it was quite a sight!
meanings.sent4: The information superhighway is like an artery connecting people across the globe.
meanings.sent5: The artery of commerce flowed through the city, bringing goods and services to all.
